list_definition.definition: the ability to amuse people; quickness to spot a joke

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a great sense of humour.

list_definition.definition: to please (someone) by agreeing with him or doing as he wishes

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There is no point in telling him he is wrong – just humour him instead.
